issue.title: [CF 782] add an option parent the icontext container to the group
issue.body:
http://www.curse.com/addons/wow/tellmewhen?comment=3587

<<quote>>
Can I change it so that only the opacity of the icon changes and not the cooldown text? It gets hard to see the cooldown text when having a low opacity and having it too high makes it hard to distinguish from the spells that are not on cooldown.
<<quote/>>

Add a setting to parent the text container to the group so that it isn't affected by icon opacity (add handling to make sure it hides when the icon is hidden, and so it hides when icon opacity is 0).

I can't make any guarantees about whether or not this will ever get successfully implemented or not.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #782 | Raw

comments.body:
Played around with this a little and discovered it isn't going to work. There are big issues with scaling and also issues with frame levels and frame stratas that causes the text to be very unreliable in terms of when it will be visible and when it won't be.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
